value:
$nMPID_双界アイラ|I'm not well suited for this sort of
thing, but I will do what I can. I leave
introductions to you, Mercedes.

$nMPID_双界アイラ|Each day during the war might have
been our last. We had no time for
luxuries like enjoying tea.

$nMPID_メルセデス|Your outfit is lovely, Ayra! You look
every inch the refined tea server.

$nMPID_双界アイラ|I saw Lord Sigurd in similar garb
earlier. He seems to have taken to
this quite well. I must work harder.

$nMPID_メルセデス|I baked these sweets myself! I think
they'll be a nice complement to the
tea, so please help yourself!

Hello! I'm Ayra, and this is Mercedes.
We're taking a break from tea service
at $Nf's castle.

$nMPID_双界アイラ|It makes no difference whether the
blade is a sword or a cake knife. You
must put your all into every slice!

$nMPID_メルセデス|Please let me know if you'd like a
second serving of cake or another
cup of tea!

$nMPID_双界アイラ|Forgive me, Mercedes, but it seems
I have broken the tea caddy. It was
more delicate than I anticipated...

$nMPID_メルセデス|Oh, Ayra, look at the beautiful tea
leaves we were gifted! I'm excited
to use them at the next tea party.

I'm Mercedes von Martritz, and this is
Ayra of Isaach. We're here for your
every tea-party need!

$nMPID_メルセデス|I don't mean to harp on this, Ayra,
but it's OK to relax a little. There's
no competition in enjoying tea!$k$p$nMPID_双界アイラ|Perhaps... But I still must work hard
for the happiness of those attending
the party.$k$p$nMPID_メルセデス|Your earnestness is admirable,
but teatime is quite different
from sword training!$k$pIt's about making time to do nothing
and just rest. It's important to give
yourself that space!$k$p$nMPID_双界アイラ|Yielding results from inaction is not
a concept I am familiar with...$k$pI will admit I did not expect to find
so much wisdom in something like
a tea party.$k$p$nMPID_メルセデス|I've found that the more you learn
about tea, the more fun it becomes!$k$pAnd it's much easier to relax when
you're having fun. I hope you're able
to have fun today, Ayra!
$nMPID_二人|You are most welcome!
$nMPID_二人|Here! Have some tea.
$nMPID_双界アイラ|Time for a rest.
$nMPID_メルセデス|So delicious!
I need practice...
You have it!
She can't be stopped!
Now! All right!
May we pour... Some more?

Must we dress this way?
There's more to tea than drinking it!
Oh?
It's empty.
I am needed elsewhere.

$nMPID_双界アイラ|How vexing. I would never have
believed it so difficult to serve a
simple beverage.

$nMPID_メルセデス|You'll get the hang of it soon! No
one would expect a princess to be
trained to serve...

$nMPID_双界アイラ|True. But even compared to
other princesses, I know little
of these things.

The truth is I spent my time not with
a teacup, but with a blade in my
hand. But that is no excuse.

$nMPID_メルセデス|Well, I'm not inclined toward physical
activity. We all focus on what we're
good at.

You are very strong, and you worked
hard to become so. Tea was not
your priority.

$nMPID_双界アイラ|Yes. I needed to safeguard my
nephew, Shannan—our prince.
$nMPID_メルセデス|That is a heavy responsibility.

$nMPID_双界アイラ|Times were hard. In that regard,
I was no different from anyone.

$nMPID_メルセデス| You're quite strict, aren't you? Even
with yourself. You remind me of some
of my classmates from Garreg Mach.

So for today, let us simply relax and
enjoy ourselves.
I think it's time for some tea!

We could enjoy it together. Oh!
There are some lovely seats
over by those flowers.

$nMPID_双界アイラ|That would be nice. You seem to
have a gift—I can allow myself to
relax around you.

$nMPID_メルセデス|I'm so glad! I have loved spending
time with you.

$nMPID_双界アイラ|It would be my pleasure to pour you
some tea. Er, if that is all right.

$nMPID_メルセデス|It certainly is. And I will happily teach
you the technique!
